item.description:
The coffee served at Cheshire Coffee is far from the ordinary, but extrodinary.

We only use the highest quality 100% arabica beans available

which are hand roasted in small batches to reach perfection in every cup.

The coffee will never be bitter or burnt.

Therefore you are getting the highest quality coffee in the entire world,

no one comes close.

We are located in Cheshire CT, right off route 10.

Stop by and try one of our drinks and deserts.

http://www.cheshirecoffee.com/

www.cheshirecoffee.com/
item.name: Get Together at Cheshire Coffee House
